page.title: 14Home Entertainment
page.content: Its wonderful how technological gadgets like television,projectors and the like get into the home at some point in time. Here are the percentages of an entertainment survey my class did (using 50 families). T.V. (b+w)-72%***T.V. (colour)-114%*** Teletext -16%***Video/VHS - 44%*** /betamax - 6%***/others - 2%*** Video disc- 6%***Cine camera - 16%*** /projector-10%***slide proj. - 20%*** camera -222%***computer - 54%*** monitor - 6%***disc drive - 2%*** wafa drive- 2%***modem - 2%*** printer - 2%***mono rec play.-38%*** stereo r.p.62%***stereo radio - 68%*** port.s.r. -88%***port.mono rad.-24%*** c.b.radio -40%***electric organ-28%*** elec.instr- 8%***personal hifi -34%*** clock rad.-88%*** special computer cass.recorder -20%***
